title: Farmers tell their stories: Laser leveling of rice fields in Southeast Asia

tasks.task: MAINTASK: Operate a laser leveling system on a rice field.
subtasks: Set up the laser transmitter at the designated position.
Secure the laser receiver to the tractor.
Connect the control panel to the receiver and transmitter.
Adjust the leveling bucket height dynamically based on receiver signals.
Monitor the field's evenness during operation.
Drive the tractor to different sections of the field, moving the leveling bucket.

tasks.task: Operate a laser leveling system on a rice field.
subtasks: Position and activate the laser transmitter.
Attach the laser receiver and leveling bucket to a tractor.
Start the tractor and move to the field.
Adjust the hydraulic valve to raise or lower the leveling bucket based on receiver signals.
Monitor the field's leveling progress and adjust as necessary.
Drive the tractor across the field, covering different sections.
Identify low-lying areas in the field and move soil to fill them using the leveling bucket.
Start the tractor and engage the laser leveling system.

tasks.task: Operate a laser leveling system on a rice field.
Level a rice field using a laser-guided system.

according to the description, the laser receiver's signals cause the hydraulic valve to open or close, so lifting or lowering the bucket. So the physical action here is raising/lowering the leveling bucket, which involves moving heavy machinery. Therefore, a MAINTASK of operating the hydraulic system to adjust the leveling bucket would be a main task, with adjusting as the primary action.
Adjust the hydraulic valve on a laser-guided leveling bucket.
Operate a laser leveling system on a rice field.
subtasks: Position the laser transmitter at the required location.
Attach the laser receiver to the tractor and secure the leveling bucket.
Start the tractor and connect the control panel to the receiver and transmitter.
Drive the tractor across the field, adjusting the hydraulic valve as needed to maintain level according to the receiver signals.
Monitor the field's leveling and make minor corrections if inaccuracies are noted.
Monitor the leveling process and ensure uniform coverage.
